item.title: Just Chris
item.description: March 20, 2024 / 7-8PM / Just Chris I plan to do a deep dive into to my favourite 90s records; from prog, trance and all-round high energy bangers. About Just Chris: Chris is a living room DJ, popular almost exclusively among friends at afters. With a keen ear and knowledge of both the modern and the classics, he hopes to bring his crafted taste to the airwaves. Instagram Genres:
